tagline: a "heads or tails" simulator for iOS
name: CoinToss
body:
### About CoinToss is a nice _heads or tails_ simulator on iOS. It comes with multiple coins, an awesome wood background & some silly sounds. The RNG is reasonably random, using proper `srand()` and `rand()`. ### Features
Throw Gesture
Just shake your phone as if you were flipping pancakes. Realistic UX for the win!
Select coins
Slide the table to the right to reveal alternative coins and some settings:
Settings
Toggle Sound, Vibration & Throw Gesture recognition
*** ### Authors In 2012 @ludwigschubert and @mruegenberg felt like they needed a little training in CoreAnimation techniques. Consequently, @mruegenberg did all the hard work while @ludwigschubert watched in awe. ### Support or Contact Having trouble with CoinToss? It really should all be on this page, however you can contact cointoss@dustlab.com and weâ€™ll try to help you sort it out. ###
